original_title: ‘Seylan Cards pave the way for heartfelt memories’
original_body_lines: With a commitment to enriching the seasonal experience, Seylan Cards has forged partnerships with over 300 leading merchants across categories such as clothing, shoes, accessories, online deals, and optical solutions. Notable among the main merchants onboard are Softlogic Brands, Spa Ceylon, D. Samson & Sons, Hameedia, Cool Planet, Fashion Bug, Nolimit, CIB, Sriyani Dresspoint, Thilakma, and many more.
